Entries.SandyComesToTown: I'll see you next Sunday, sweetie!$h
Entries.SandyEmilyDating: Oh, @! I'm so happy. Emily and I talked, and she feels the same way about me.$h

Entries.SandyComesToTown: Thanks again for helping me get Sandy on board with visiting more often. I know it'll be good for her!$h
Entries.SandyVisitsTheSaloon: Sandy told me Mayor Lewis invited her to attend our festivals! I'm so happy!$h
Entries.SandyEmilyDating: Did you hear, @? Sandy and I are a couple now!#$b#Thank you so much for your encouragement!

Entries.SandyComesToTown: Emily won't stop going on and on about how Sandy'll be coming to visit us every Sunday. *sigh* Sandy's nice, but enough already!$3
Entries.SandyEmilyDating: Did you hear? Emily and Sandy are dating now.#$b#Well, it took her long enough, but I'm glad Emily finally admitted how she really felt. She seems much happier now.

Entries.SandyVisitsTheSaloon: Sandy seems like a nice young lady. It'll be good for her to visit town more often.
I appreciate you helping Sandy out and introducing her to people. I'm sure she'll feel like she's part of the community in no time.$h
